DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether access website personalize feedback physical activity level suggestion increase physical activity result improvement self-reported physical activity , anthropometrics physiological measurement
DOC.detailed_description: In website-based intervention study , investigator wish examine possible increase physical activity among inactive person . Main objective determine access website personalize feedback PA level suggestion increase PA result improvement self report PA , anthropometrics apply physiological measurement . Physical inactive adult ( n=12,287 ) participate nationwide health survey examination ( DANHES ) ask randomly assign either intervention ( n=6,055 ) control group ( n=6,232 ) . The intervention group access PA website personalize advice suggestion increase PA. After 3 6 month , follow-up questionnaire administer e-mail . The 7-day International Physical Activity Questionnaire include questionnaire ass four domain PA daily-life ( work , transportation , domestic , leisure-time ) sedentary time . Furthermore , 3 month follow-up subgroup participant ( n=1,190 ) invite complete anthropometrics physiological measurement .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Physically inactive leisure time ( assess self report questionnaire ) Presence serious heart problem able perform everyday activity Highly physically active leisure time ( assess self report questionnaire )
